html:
8.7.22  8:09 am   why do you tweet?

     that's the best feature of twitter. the 'tweet' feature. this is using the platform as the original creators intended

     how do you determine what you're going to tweet?

     i start throwing ideas around and see what excites me. then if possible i can give it another twist or two, to see if it excites me more. other times it occurs to me unexpectedly when not trying to work on it. i just realized these are all the same things that happen in songwriting

      do you think about what to tweet very carefully or are these just spontaneous bursts of consciousness?

     thinking carefully will unfortunately not get the job done, so in the cases where it does not come quickly, pretty much you gotta just sit around and play in the dirt somehow until it does come quickly. i just realized these are all the same things that happen in songwriting

     are your tweets excerpts from your notes or are your notes (as seen in the notebook page, currently, in the modern era) just selected tweets?

     if you see a note that's identical to a tweet, the date of the note should always be earlier. the notebook page always attempts to reflect the original date the item was written. but often things are composed and then posted to twitter immediately. i am not against this. i could and maybe should do this with songs also, somehow

8.7.22  6:02 am   how to love a stranger

      too late, you already do

8.7.22  4:08 am   did you play the lick 5 times at 2:22 of your new song? 

      not quite

8.7.22  3:41 am   can you write a song about non-euclidean geometry

      sure

8.7.22  2:10 am   What's your opinion on the planet Saturn

      very big planet. not the biggest, but besides the biggest it is biggest. biggest non biggest planet

8.7.22  12:44 am   are you ever gonna make a super angry song?

      yes

8.6.22  10:49 pm   i have so many projects and hobbies that i want to work on going through my mind, how the heck do i organize them all so my brain can calm down??????????!

      just start writing them down, in any order

8.6.22  9:43 pm   Why did you want to start doing 3d?

      start depicting some places, in a much more placey way

8.6.22  8:37 pm   How bout you write a song about christmas someday?

      i've done it before and i'll do it again

8.6.22  6:30 pm   do you like bread

      the flavor overwhelms me

8.6.22  5:25 pm   do you have any tips for remembering songs that come to you in dreams?

     other than having quick access to recording device and your favorite chordal instrument, no

      sometimes i dream about a song but when i wake up i can never remember it well enough to record myself singing it

      yes, they can slip away fast

8.6.22  4:50 pm   am i just not competent enough?

      that didn't occur to me

8.6.22  4:50 pm   Why didnt the Romans go to America

      maybe they forgot

8.6.22  3:27 pm   if you were marooned on an island what would it be

      maroon island

8.6.22  1:02 pm   i want to be an artist but at the same time i dont want to "be" an artist. can i just be anything else in an artistic manner?

      sure

8.6.22  12:49 pm   how often do you get song recommendations on here

      once per song

8.6.22  11:56 am   What's your favourite Batman villain?

      the protagonist

8.6.22  10:24 am   Opinion on donkeys?

      both a vehicle and a passenger

8.6.22  10:23 am   what is the funkiest language ?

      funk

8.6.22  8:29 am   have you ever considered getting rid of time signatures?

      sure. i do it all the time

8.6.22  1:53 am   How did you come up with the idea to stack up many samples of "days and days" in your song "I'm A Huge Gamer Most Of The Time"?

      common sense really

8.6.22  1:28 am   how do i find inspiration?

      it's right there

8.6.22  1:01 am   Can you write a song about hurricanes?

      maybe but first i need to do a few more songs about non-hurricanes

8.5.22  11:00 pm   What do you think about when you're trying to go to sleep?

     i select a random 9 digit number and try to prime factorize it

      Is it hard for you to fall asleep?

     it seems impossible, and yet i can prove that it's happened before

      Thanks man, love your work.

8.5.22  10:02 pm   what if the ice cream truck sound and the police car sound were switched? 

      people would do crime just to hear the song

8.5.22  9:55 pm   How to use time valuably 

      tell the truth

8.5.22  7:38 pm   Hey, how do you cope with feeling like your content isn't good enough if it isn't "perfect"?

     i've become aware that 'perfect' can only mean complete blankness and silence. and that was never my goal

     Because I always and up scrapping every project I start when I feel like it isn't good enough. I start doubting myself, and I abandon it. But I really want to put my content out there for people to see (I mostly make art and animations) and it bothers me a lot that I'm so self conscious. Do you have any advice that could maybe help me?

     eventually the need to be seen should outweigh the fear somehow, and you'll be able to broker some kind of scheme with yourself, on the best terms you can think of

8.5.22  6:22 pm   what do you think of shift key on your keyboard?

      spacious. enough to really swim around in

8.5.22  4:59 pm   how do i choose a future for myself when i don't know what to do or what to be

      go outside and inside repeatedly

8.5.22  3:36 pm   do you have any tips for avoiding the sunk-cost fallacy?

      try to get some lessons out of it

8.5.22  2:52 pm   Whats your favorite song?

      i can't think of any songs

8.5.22  2:28 pm   Do you think some of the people here are trapped in their heads with their problems/egos, so they try reaching out to someone like you for help in solving their problems or to get your perspective on things?

     that seems plausible

     What if there's nothing wrong with anyone? That there are no problems, that they're all illusions?

     well, at the very least there are some challenges which can be interesting to solve

8.5.22  2:27 pm   opinion on round chairs

      easy to roll them from place to place

8.5.22  11:06 am   I suggest you make a song about frogs. Frogs are cool.

      ok, i just have to finish up a few more songs about non-frogs

8.5.22  9:03 am   Whats your favorite song that you've made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

8.5.22  7:42 am   what train route would you really like to exist, that doesn't yet exist?

      new york to paris

8.5.22  3:36 am   how often do you think about the moon?

      constantly

8.5.22  2:38 am   Where do you get your creativity from?

      directly in front of me. never look side to side

8.5.22  1:06 am   have you ever messed with audio channels for a song? (Right and left)

      i mess with them insomuch as i make a stereo mix

8.5.22  12:20 am   your work makes me very happy :o) how did you start doing what you do ?

      gradually

      no

      you requested this

      now it's time for you to think about whatever you feel are the most important ideas

8.4.22  9:28 pm   Are there any little easter eggs in a music video that you think nobody's noticed yet?

     sure

     If so, then what? or give a little hint

     the street signs outside of the corner store say "dirth st" and "guernsey ave"

8.4.22  8:41 pm   What is your favorite genre of music

      sensual

8.4.22  7:07 pm   when was the initial idea for 'i like to wear soft clothing (cause it makes me feel like i'm rough, in comparison)' written

     the first 4 bars (title line) were written sep 20, 2018. the rest was written about 3 weeks ago

     / how long has it been in the next song roulette?

      ever since sep 20, 2018 it has been available. it made it to the finals many times this year, including feb 13 (when 'special sandals' was picked instead), apr 1 (when 'corner store' was picked instead), apr 22 (when "if the world doesn't end" was picked instead) and jul 13, when it was finally picked

8.4.22  6:37 pm   favorite branch of science?

      pseudo

8.4.22  6:21 pm   i remember i asked you a question about breakfast food around 3 years ago and i never checked to see if you responded. so i'll ask again, waffles or pancakes?

      ah, the classic cry of someone who has yet to discover waff cakes

8.4.22  5:25 pm   Do you think you'll add any more sections to this site someday?

      yes
